|chip1 = Marvell;88W8362;88W8362-BEN1, GW01951A.1, 0741 A2P, TW; |chip2 = Marvell;88W8060;88W6060-NNR1, K66722.2, 0751 A3P, TW; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WUBM-183GN_V02" and "190-C04-3201R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
WUSB300N serial numbers appear to start with '''MNT0'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA5604|09/14/2007}}
